name: W3SC Elementor to Zoho CRM
author: W3SCloud Technology

sections.description:
This plugin integrate Zoho CRM with Elementor. Whenever user submit a Elementor form, if a integration is created for the form then form entry will be inserted to CRM automatically.

Unlimited From Submission

This plugin works well with forms created by Elementor. Just select the form fields and ready to map.

Easy Setting Instructions

Instructions are provided on the plugin settings page. Follow the instruction and create a new Zoho Client, there you will get the credentials.

Easy to Map Zoho CRM fields

Map easily to Elementor fields to substitute Zoho CRM Lead and Contact module fields. No limitation on number of fields.

Map Custom Fields

Map custom fields easily to Zoho CRM Lead module fields and map any numbers of custom fields.

On-click Enable

You can enable integration by your choice only one click.

Zoho logs (Premium feature)

View a detailed log of each Elementor submission submit into Zoho CRM and easily resend Elementor submission to Zoho CRM.

Create Or Update Contact and Lead in Zoho(Premium feature)

If an entry already exists in Zoho CRM, update it otherwise create a new entry in Zoho CRM.

Others Zoho CRM Modules (Premium feature)

In our premium plugin its working on Zoho CRM others module (Contacts, Account, Lead, Order, Case) and also work fine with custom module as well
sections.installation:
W3SCElementortoZoho CRM plugin require “Elementor” plugin to work. Please install and activate “Elementor” before installation.

follow the instruction below:

  1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/W3SCElementortoZoho directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Use the Integrations->Zoho Auth Settings screen to authenticate Zoho CRM
  4. Create and insert Zoho Credentials using displayed Information then save.
  5. Press Grant Access button to authorize Zoho CRM For this Integration.
  6. Create a page in WP and edit by Elementor
  7. Take a Elementor section, drag and drop W3SC Elementor to Zoho
  8. Create input fields as much as you need
sections.faq:
Is this plugin FREE?

Yes, this plugin is completely free but we have a pro version for extended functionality.

How to get Zoho Client Credentials?

Please follow the instruction on the plugin settings page and create a new Zoho Client, there you will get the credentials.

In which modules of Zoho CRM this plugin can insert data?

At this moment we only support inserting into the “Leads” module.
sections.changelog:
2.2.0

PHP 8 Support.
WordPress 6.2 Support.
Elementor 3.13.1 Support.
Corrected spelling errors.
Bug Fixed.

2.1.0

Implement new framework with zoho crm API version 2.
Removed Titan framework.
Changed some options.

1.1.0

Minor Bug fixed.
Custom hooks introduced.

1.0.1

Minor Bug fixed.

1.0.0

Initial release of the plugin.
